summary: This is an email chain between FBI and US Attorney's Office (NY) personnel discussing investigative steps regarding Mark Epstein, including obtaining phone records via subpoena and an emergency disclosure request. The document shows coordination early in an investigation.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the email discussion regarding phone records and subpoenas.

events.title: Coordination on Mark Epstein investigation
events.description: FBI and US Attorney's Office personnel exchange emails about obtaining phone records for Mark Epstein via subpoena and an emergency disclosure request.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated May 26, 2020, discussing investigative steps regarding Mark Epstein.
Phone numbers associated with Mark Epstein are linked to VoIP lines, complicating the subpoena process.
An emergency disclosure request has been made to obtain the phone records.
The US Attorney's Office is awaiting supervisory approval to formally handle the investigation but is willing to assist with subpoenas in the meantime.
